snippet.title: Golem - Available Now!
snippet.description:
The adventure puzzle game Golem is available now on Steam and most major digital retailers. https://store.steampowered.com/app/646010/Golem/

Follow Golem and Longbow Games
Twitter: @golemgame and @longbowgames
Facebook: facebook.com/golemgame/ and facebook.com/longbowgames

Experience the heartwarming journey of a young girl and a shape-shifting golem as they navigate the ruins of an ancient tower to solve its challenging puzzles and awaken its long dormant machines.
